mapper.select: SELECT ReplyId, Re_Title, Re_Content, DATE_FORMAT(Re_CreationDate,'%Y-%m-%d') AS Re_CreationDate, r.BoardId, r.MemberId, u.UserName FROM Reply r INNER JOIN User u ON r.MemberId = u.MemberId INNER JOIN board b ON (r.BoardId = b.BoardId) AND r.BoardId = #{BoardId} WHERE ReplyId=#{ReplyId}
